title: ServiceNow and OpenAI Push AI Past Chatbots into Real CX Work
summary: ServiceNow and OpenAI are advancing AI beyond chatbots to address the gap between customer requests and actual resolution, potentially transforming ITSM, ITOM, HRSM, ESM, and EX operations. This partnership could significantly alter the landscape of workflow automation and employee service management.
hook: ServiceNow, OpenAI partnership: Beyond chatbots, real CX work!

title: Omnichat Unveils Omni AI Agent Studio to Power WhatsApp Customer Interactions
summary: Omnichat has launched Omni AI Agent Studio, a tool designed to enhance customer interactions on WhatsApp using AI and conversational tools. This development could impact ES buyers by offering a new channel for customer engagement and potentially influencing ITSM/ESM/HRSM strategies.
hook: Omnichat's new AI tool transforms WhatsApp into customer engagement hub!

title: ServiceNow will embed OpenAI models into its AI Platform
summary: ServiceNow plans to integrate OpenAI models into its AI platform to enhance enterprise AI outcomes and develop direct speech-to-speech technology. This move is significant for ITSM/ITOM/HRSM/ESM/EX buyers as it will enable more natural interactions and break language barriers, thereby improving employee experience and workflow automation.
hook: ServiceNow to boost ES with OpenAI models integration!

title: Latest News
summary: Enghouse Interactive, a global provider of customer contact software and service solutions, is transforming contact centres into growth engines with a complete portfolio of modular solutions, including AI-enabled agent evaluation. The company offers a range of deployment options and platform-agnostic solutions that integrate with various UC vendors.
hook: Enghouse Interactive revolutionizes contact centres with AI

title: News
summary: Enterprise technology costs are increasing due to vendor consolidation, consumption-based pricing, and market leverage. This could impact ES buyers as companies like Oracle invest heavily in AI data centers, potentially leading to higher costs but also providing negotiation leverage for CIOs.
hook: Rising enterprise tech costs: What it means for ES buyers.

title: News
summary: Oracle has enhanced its platform with new features such as agent-to-agent collaboration, multi-LLM orchestration, and enterprise-grade governance, positioning itself as a strong contender in the AI automation race. This development could impact ITSM/ITOM/HRSM/ESM/EX buyers by offering more advanced automation capabilities.
hook: Oracle steps up in AI automation race with new features.

title: News
summary: Salesforce is enhancing its AI capabilities through acquisitions and has introduced pay-as-you-go and pre-commit payment options for its Agentforce. This move is aimed at managing K8s deployments and reducing TCO, which could impact ITSM and ITOM strategies.
hook: Salesforce boosts AI capabilities, introduces flexible payment options!
